previous_case.outcome: Four accused convicted and sentenced to life imprisonment for murder of Mst. Sharifan.

current_case.charge: Section 302 P.P.C. for murder of Mst. Sharifan
current_case.outcome: Charge under Section 302 P.P.C. not established; convicted under Section 364 P.P.C.

legal_issues.main_issue: Conviction under Section 364 P.P.C. without formal charge.

court_findings.section_237: Controlled by Section 236, hence not applicable.
court_findings.section_238: Minor offence must be cognate to major offence; Section 364 P.P.C. and Section 302 P.P.C. are not cognate.

directions.retrial: Sessions Judge to amend charge to include Section 364 P.P.C. in the alternative and decide case afresh.
directions.opportunity: Appellant to be given opportunity to meet amended charge.

notes.single_judge_hearing: Appeal heard by single judge due to conflict of interest of other judges.
notes.applicable_rules: Rule IV of Ch. 3-B of Vol. V of Lahore High Court Rules and Orders.
